name: contra
description: Asynchronous flow control with a functional taste to it

scripts.build: browserify -s contra -do dist/contra.js contra.js && uglifyjs -m -c -o dist/contra.min.js dist/contra.js
scripts.build-shim: browserify -do dist/contra.shim.js contra.shim.js && uglifyjs -m -c -o dist/contra.shim.min.js dist/contra.shim.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run build-shim && npm run test && npm run deployment
scripts.deployment: git add dist && npm version ${BUMP:-"patch"} --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -am "Autogenerated pre-deployment commit" && bower version ${BUMP:-"patch"} && git reset HEAD~2 && git add . && git commit -am "Release $(cat package.json | jq -r .version)" && git push --tags && npm publish && git push
